header.note: The source node in most cases contains the sample message as written by the developer. If it looks like a dot-delimitted string such as "form.label.firstname", then the developer has not provided a default message.

trans-unit.source: Congrats, your password has been changed, you can now login to eZ Platform.
trans-unit.target: Congrats, your password has been changed, you can now login to eZ Platform.

trans-unit.source: This link is not valid anymore, you can generate a new link to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: This link is not valid anymore, you can generate a new link to reset your password.
